## MIT Statistics and Data Science MicroMasters
## Probability

Notes

$Var(X) = E[X^2] - (E[X])^2$

Law of iterated expectations:  
$E[X] = E[E[X|\theta]]$  
$Var(X) = E[Var(X|\theta)] + Var(E[X|\theta])$  


Linear Least Mean Square Estimator:  
$\hat{\theta}_{LLMS} = E[\theta] + \frac{cov(\theta,X)}{Var(X)}(X-E[X])$
